SELECT_TARGETLISTDATA_1.Statement: SELECT user_id ,mail_addr ,mail_addr_kbn FROM dbo.w2_TargetListData WHERE dept_id = @dept_id AND target_kbn = 'TargetList' AND master_id = @master_id_1

SELECT_TARGETLISTDATA_2.Statement: SELECT user_id ,mail_addr ,mail_addr_kbn FROM dbo.w2_TargetListData WHERE dept_id = @dept_id AND target_kbn = 'TargetList' AND master_id = @master_id_2
